TopicTitle: I survived! Join the survivor camp! Let KSI help you!

Articles.Content:
Hello fellow Kerbonauts! After the sudden DDOS attack of Kerbin by the universe computer, not many kerbals survived. So a Kerbal Search Initiative (KSI) division was formed to find the remaining kerbals and fight the difficulties of deleted "threads", as called on Kerbin. So let us find you, post 1 post in this thread and make yourself heard! Please post ONLY one post to make it easier to count you all. If you want to say something else, just edit your first post!

CURRENT SURVIVOR COUNT: |0065|Ã¯Â¿Â½Ã¯Â¿Â½Ã¯Â¿Â½Ã¯Â¿Â½Ã¯Â¿Â½Ã¯Â¿Â½

Help spread the news!

P.S. Special gift every 100 survivors

Keep the survivors coming!

Edited April 27, 2013 by iDan122
I somewhat survived the GDOS, if it was the GDOS which got us D:
I survived but my name got shortened from Halsfury_10
I survived without any problem.
I'm still here.

I'm still here.

"im still alive." lol Glados.

I'm alive.

And I lost about 500 posts.

Yeah... I took a pretty big hit.

I survived! And lost 1,000 posts

"im still alive." lol Glados.

We do what we must because we can, for the good of all of us, except the ones who are dead lost their accounts

Edited April 21, 2013 by swiftgates24

I am feeling very petulant because I lost about 1,080 posts. I mean, I know it's an abstract number. But it was an abstract number that I liked.

Well, I guess I'd better get to yammering if I want to build it back up again.
I'm taking this as a chance to be more active on the forums; since everyone else is starting from nothing, I won't look so n00by when answering questions
I survived, but I lost about half of my posts.
Guess what? I'm *turns on musical voice* "Still alive!"

I'm alive and clicking

Dont know how many posts I lost, only looks like 30 - 40.

Edited April 21, 2013 by zpox357
I survived but I didn't have many posts to begin with, I think I only had 150 or something?
I'm ok kind of.

I'm alive! And I have my Art for Swans avatar again! But I think I lost nearly 400 posts. Eh, I'll live.

Edited April 21, 2013 by AlternNocturn
Was brutally injured, but my name still survives, haha.
I survived... lost about 60-70 posts though i think.
I alive!!!! I don't know how many posts i lost though, I didn't had hundred anyways.

*Climbs out of rubble* W-w-what happened? *Looks around* My God... So many dead accounts...

I got out alright because I've been on the forum since July of 2011, but I lost more than 600 posts. I do get to celebrate two 1000th posts though!
I'm alive.
The RP Idiot lives! I lost around 100 posts, but post count really means nothing with custom titles.
I have no idea how many posts I had, so I voted yes and no.
Luckily I survived in my little bunker with a guaranteed survival rate of 5% from Jeb!
I think I survived... It- it all happened so fast.
